name: Treasure Island
overview: Treasure Island is a colourful graphical adventure. Ifs compulsive and such fun to play. On a remote desert Isle in the Pacific, Captain Hook, the meanest pirate that ever lived, buried his treasure many years ago . . ... ! By giving commands to your Lynx in reply to the cryptic questions it asks, try and find the hidden treasure. Ifs not easy and there are many dangers and pitfalls for you to negotiate before the Magic Isle will give up its treasures to you!!!
